title: Saddleback Mountain-Arizona Settlement Act of 1995
content: Saddleback Mountain-Arizona Settlement Act of 1995 - Approves and ratifies the Settlement Agreement providing for the transfer of certain lands by the Resolution Trust Corporation to the Salt River Pima-Maricopa Indian Community and the City of Scottsdale, Arizona. Directs the Corporation to make such land transfer. Declares that the United States shall not be liable for any preexisting conditions on the land to be held in trust for the Community. Sets forth land use limitations .
